summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Arts Commission, amending Section 1 of Ordinance 99982 to change the expiration date for terms on the Commission from June 1 to December 31, and to extend the terms of members currently serving on the commission from June 1, 1979 and June 1, 19980, to December 31, 1979 and December 31, 1980 respectively.
